scripts.start: npm run replica && npm run deploy && npm run vite
scripts.replica: dfx stop && rm -rf .dfx power-equalizer/.dfx && dfx start --clean --background
scripts.deploy:power-equalizer: cd power-equalizer && dfx canister create staging && dfx deploy --no-wallet --mode reinstall -y --argument '(principal "'$(dfx canister id staging)'")' staging && dfx canister call staging addAsset '(record {name = "privat";payload = record {ctype = "text/html"; data = vec {blob "hello world!"} } })' && dfx canister call staging initMint '(vec {"1c7a48ba6a562aa9eaa2481a9049cdf0433b9738c992d698c31d8abf89cadc79"})' && cd ..
scripts.deploy:ledger: . ./set-deploy-env.zsh && dfx deploy ledger --no-wallet --mode reinstall -y --argument '(record {minting_account = "'$(dfx ledger account-id)'"; initial_values = vec { record { "'$WALLET_ADDRESS'"; record { e8s=100_000_000_000 } }; }; send_whitelist = vec {}})'
scripts.deploy: dfx canister create --all && npm run deploy:ledger && npm run deploy:power-equalizer
